MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the PA14 and PA15 postcode areas of Port Glasgow and Greenock, affecting properties in Glenpark Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 5.53pm. Our engineers are on their way to the Mitchell Street substation and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.12pm on Thursday 18th February 2021.
